name: Ajit Reddy
tagline: Eager to explore roles in core electronics and embedded systems. Seeking industrial contacts.
about: Ajit is building a foundation in hardware design and microcontrollers. He aims for a career in the semiconductor industry and is looking for advice on specialized courses.

name: Neha Patel
tagline: Civil engineer with a focus on sustainable infrastructure and project management.
about: Neha is a proactive student specializing in structural analysis software. She is looking for internship opportunities in large construction or consulting firms.

name: Deepak Singh
tagline: Mechanical engineer specializing in Robotics and CAD/CAM systems.
about: Deepak is leading the college robotics team and has hands-on experience with embedded systems. He is open to discussing innovative product design ideas.

name: Isha Varma
tagline: First-year student exploring Computer Science and its intersection with finance (FinTech).
about: Isha is just starting her journey, focused on strong foundational programming skills and understanding the career landscape in high-growth technology sectors like FinTech.

name: Rahul Khanna
tagline: Electronics student with a keen interest in telecommunications and 5G technology.
about: Rahul completed a summer project on signal processing and is looking to join a large telecom or semiconductor firm post-graduation. He is focused on core job interviews.

name: Samira Khan
tagline: Information Technology student exploring UI/UX design and Frontend development.
about: Samira is a self-taught designer and developer, skilled in modern frontend frameworks. She is building a portfolio of web applications and seeking feedback from design experts.
